page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: {SHEEP FARMING} In spring the lambs are born and older lambs sold.When summer comes they are dipped in disenfectant.Also the lambs have to be marked,jagged and their tails cut off. Rams are bought in the autumn. In the winter the farmers go out to the sheep to give them food.Often when lambs are born they could have stiff legs or sway back and can't walk properly.The ones with stiff legs get jagged with an antibiotic.The lambs with sway back can't be cured.To prevent sway back the ewes can be jagged with copper before they have a lamb. On our farm my brother and I help with this work.
